title: Tyler Cameron gives pep talk to Hannah Brown in a comment
text:
Hannah Brown ended up in tears at the Dancing With The Stars set on Monday.

And her ex Tyler Cameron took to the comments to console her after she made a post about it.

'Fall down 7 times, get up 8!' Cameron wrote underneath an emotional Instagram post Brown made on Tuesday about the 'defeating' feedback she received on-air.

Getting real: Hannah Brown ended up in tears offstage at Dancing With the Stars

Support: Her ex Tyler Cameron took to the comments to console her after she made a post about it

'You got this HB. Be where your feet are and enjoy the ride. You’re doing amazing.'

The 25-year-old former Bachelorette emoted about the challenges of being a DWTS season 28 contestant in a lengthy caption of a few photos where she's on-set and in the rehearsal room.

She began: 'This experience has been harder than I could have ever imagined.

BTS: The 25-year-old former Bachelorette emoted about the challenges of being a DWTS season 28 contestant in a lengthy caption of a few photos where she's on-set and in the rehearsal room

'I came into this experience a little broken and confused - more than I’ve shared. Every day has brought its challenges with my past, my fears, and the uncomfortableness of opening myself up again to be judged on something VERY scary like learning a new skill to perform each week.

'Last night was really defeating for me and a lot of suppressed emotions started to surface from this amazing, but grueling experience,' she continued.

Brown went further: 'I can take criticism and understand hard work … and I also know that my attitude has to change to rise above this slump I’m in.

Everybody dance now: Brown went further: 'I can take criticism and understand hard work … and I also know that my attitude has to change to rise above this slump I’m in'

'But this is real life. These are real emotions. It’s okay to be grateful and positive, while also acknowledging the hard days we all have.

'It’s so important to think positively, but it’s also important to acknowledge and feel all the feels. This pressure to pretend is not good for anyone. That’s how this crazy cycle of perfectionism continues to exist in a lot of us.'

Us Weekly reports that Brown 'cried offstage' according to an unnamed source.

Move: She began: 'This experience has been harder than I could have ever imagined'

The judges told Brown that her dancing was 'disconnected' from her emotions, a criticism that sparked her tears.

'I need you to give your heart,' judge Carrie Ann Inaba said. 'We want to see layers that nobody has seen before and I know it’s hard to do but, I swear, if you open up and let it go raw out here, we will be here for you.'

Cameron, who finished as runner-up on Brown's season of The Bachelorette, told Us Weekly that he is voting for Brown on DWTS.

'Of course I want her to win,' the Texas native told the outlet. 'She looks like she’s having a blast. It looks so much fun. She’s killing it.'
